name: TakeinstantsnapshotwithAlexavoicecommand
0:
”Alexa, Ask my camera to take a photo of the living room”
”Alexa, Ask my camera to take a picture of the living room”
”Alexa, Ask my camera to take a snapshot of the living room”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my camera
Developer Terms of Use
des: You can now take a snapshot with Alexa voice command by simply saying "Alexa, take a snapshot with [location]". Before you get started, please make sure your Amaryllo camera is online and updated to the latest firmware. Then enable the Amaryllo skill in Alexa app or ask Alexa to enable the skill by saying "Alexa, enable the my camera skill" and you will be directed to link your Amaryllo account with Alexa account.
